Uses of Class
logic.piece.Piece

  • Packages that use Piece 
    Package Description
    logic
    The logic package contains the relevant items for running an actual game of Jungle.
    logic.piece
    This package contains everything related to the individual pieces on the Jungle board.
    logic.tile
    This package handles all logic and related to the tiles on the game board.

      The list or Black's pieces
      protected java.util.ArrayList<Piece> Game._graveYard
      The list of pieces that have been captured during the game
      protected java.util.ArrayList<Piece> Game._redPieces
      The list of Red's pieces
      Methods in logic that return Piece 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Piece GameBoard.move(int row, int column, int newRow, int newColumn)
      Given a starting row and column and an ending row and column (called newRow and newColumn), this method moves the piece found at the starting position if possible.
      Methods in logic that return types with arguments of type Piece 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.ArrayList<Piece> Game.getBlackPieces()
      Returns an ArrayList containing Red's pieces.
      java.util.ArrayList<Piece> Game.getRedPieces()
      Returns an ArrayList containing Red's pieces.
      Method parameters in logic with type arguments of type Piece 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.ArrayList<Tile> Game.getNextMove(java.util.ArrayList<Piece> movesOfSide)
      Returns the move the computer would make as black.
